alert.note: Alert for Scotland (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 7:42PM CDT until June 15 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Quad Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Van Buren County in southeastern Iowa... Northern Scotland County in northeastern Missouri... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 742 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lancaster, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Kilwinning around 750 PM CDT. Hitt around 800 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Brock, Milton, Cantril, Lebanon, Azen, Lake Sugema Campground, Keosauqua, Lacey Keosauqua State Park, Keosauqua Airport and Van Buren County Fairgrounds. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building.
